moves.2. e3 g6 3. Bd3 Bg7 4. Nd2 O-O 5. f4 d5: This is usual in the stonewall attack, going for c3
moves.10. Ng5: This is a variation, more often seeing Ne5, but i was pushing e6 pawn
moves.15... Re8 16. e4: I must admit this move leads to wrong very often, but with de Ne6 still, King area gets more pushed. And also must admit i really like this move!
moves.16... Bf8 17. exd5 exd5: The midd canal, now g6 is under pressure
moves.18. Bd2: Here is a mistake, i went out of ideas at the moment, and get into trouble
moves.18... Qxb2 19. Rac1 Qxa2: A little advantage, time to play all in
moves.20. Be3: Quit the B so it does´t get busted by the queen if i use B on c2
moves.20... Bd6 21. Nxg6: The Sacrifice, and a good one i think
moves.22... Re7 23. f5: Open space for bishop, thought h5 will be a nice a defence for eventuallities
moves.25... Re4 26. Ng5 Rg4: This is just crazy!! I mean the hole table
moves.28. Bf7+: And with a little fortune it is over
moves.28... Kh8 29. Qh3: Perfect Structure is no way out
moves.29... Nh7 30. Bg7+: The end (Qh7 mate). Really enjoyed!! Thank You!!
